alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Lyon; Murray; Pipestone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 05 at 4:00AM CST until January 05 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one half inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. For the first Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Lincoln, Lyon, Murray and Pipestone Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the first Wind Chill Advisory, until noon CST today. For the second Wind Chill Advisory, from 4 PM this afternoon to 3 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
